claim_card.claim: The 1:2:3 structure is extracted directly from JHTDB turbulence data using a Narrative Tick event-sampling approach.
claim_card.test_hook: Recompute NT timestamps and ratio histograms from JHTDB series; check stability across probes and windows.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: Using the Johns Hopkins Turbulence Database (JHTDB)... We compute a time series of 'Narrative Ticks' (NTs)
